title: As a BOC user I want approving items from my Approvals clipboard to process them in the correct order
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to approve more than one tx item for the same player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects multiple transactions for the same player
custom_expected:
THEN the system should process them in the order they were submitted to the BOC

*For example, if a Club user submits a "Return from Rehab" for a player and then immediately submits a "Reinstate from DL" for the same player, the BOC should be able to check both of these off and the system should first approve the Return from Rehab, and then the Reinstate from DL based on the submission date/time.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to view the File Attachments tab on the Utilities menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user wants to view File Attachments
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the Utilities tab on the left nav
custom_expected:
THEN "File Attachments" is a new option under the Utilities left nav menu, displayed in its correct place in the alpha order of tabs. 
AND This tab and utility should have its own permission set. 
AND Selecting File Attachments should navigate the user to the File Attachments utility.  
AND "Transaction" should default to having the "All" checkbox checked, and the dropdown disabled. 
AND Attachment Label should default to blank. 
AND The Date range should default to the prior week. (From date is one week ago today, and to date is today's date). 
AND De-selecting "All" for "Transaction" should enable the dropdown. The dropdown should contain every transaction type in the system.
AND "Attachment Label" dropdown should contain a list of all of the attachment labels available for the varying transactions in the system. (If this is not something that can be easily queried I can provide a list). 
AND The Date range should default to the prior week. (From date is one week ago today, and to date is today's date) and be editable. Both dates are required for the utility to work.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to email uploaded files in bulk
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user navigates to the File Attachments utility
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Generate Email"
AND clicks  " " after entering the required details, the system will email the selected file(s) to the designated email address(es)
custom_expected:
THEN new pop-up enabling the user to enter the desired email address(es) to send the selected files, as well as a subject line and a brief message 
AND The emails should appear as though they are coming directly from the user using the utility (the username)
AND user should be able to send emails for any type or combination of params available on the utility

title: As a user I want to be able to quickly email an attachment to someone
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to quickly email an attachment to someone
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the email icon 
AND after filling in required fields clicks "Send"
custom_expected:
THEN a pop-up for the user to enter in the desired email address(es), subject and body of an email
AND Subject should default to "Last, First - Label" with the "Label" being the selected label on the attached file
AND clicking "send" will email the uploaded file to the entered address(es)
AND The email will in some way indicate that it is being sent on behalf of the user, and not just "ebis"

title: As a BOC user I want the system to automatically determine how many emails are required to send the number of attachments that I have selected to send
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is sending an email with many attachments 
AND navigates to the File Attachment utility
custom_expected:
THEN the system will generate as many emails as are needed to the entered email address(es) with the same subject line and body, with no more than 20MB of attachments each. 
AND Ideally the subject line or body would have some numbering to indicate that the multiple emails are intentional and distinct and not just a mistaken duplicate. 

*Ex: Email (1/3), Email (2/3), Email (3/3) or something to that effect.

title: As a user I want the Roster Counts widget to be more interactive - Part 2
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to quickly jump to different transaction and statuses from the Roster Counts widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the number next to "Preliminary Transactions"
OR clicks the number next to "Pending Transactions"
OR clicks the number next to "Signed for Next Year"
custom_expected:
THEN system should navigate to an already run advanced search for "Transactions" that are in a "Preliminary" status for the selected Org AND Club 
OR system should navigate to an already run advanced search for "Transactions" that are in a "Submitted to BOC" status for the selected Org AND Club
OR system should navigate to an already run advanced search for "Professional Players" that have a MN Roster Status of "Signed for Next Year" for the selected Org AND Club
AND All 3 numbers should be link blue

title: As a user I want to be able to quick search for international amateur players who have not yet reached their Eligible to Sign date
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=1966578

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Running a quick search for an international amateur player will no longer limit the results set to players who have passed their eligible to sign date.

title: As a user I want to only see a "Close" button on players that have not yet reached their Eligible to Sign Date
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing the international amateur player profile of a player who has not yet reached their eligible to sign date, the system should only display a "Close" button. 
* Users will be required to make any edits to these players in the amateur system.

title: As a user I want grandfathered players' contact information to carry over to their professional profile
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* When a grandfathered player is loaded in 2.5 and signed, the system should display and maintain their contact information, unlike with registration players.

title: As a user I want to be able to advanced search for international amateur players who have not yet reached their Eligible to Sign date
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=1966578

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Running an advanced search for an international amateur player will no longer limit the results set to players who have passed their eligible to sign date.

title: As a user I want to only see International Amateurs in quick search that I have permission to see
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=1966578

Acceptance Criteria: 
* BOC users will have no additional visibility restrictions aside from what is already restricted for quick search. 
* Club users will only see profiles that they have permission to see. 
* Detailed rules are in the rules document and should be followed exactly.

title: As a user I want to only see International Amateurs in advanced search that I have permission to see
custom_steps:
Business Rules: 
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req?projectId=14044&docId=1966578

Acceptance Criteria: 
* BOC users will see all international amateurs in their advanced search result set. 
* Club users will only see profiles that they have permission to see. 
* Detailed rules are in the rules document and should be followed exactly.
